list.name: Lateral GmbH
list.desc: Co-Founder & CTO of a machine learning based start-up. Helping to build the company from an initial concept phase to a production SaaS app. Leading a team of developers and developing the product in collaboration with creative and business counterparts.

list.name: Freelance full-stack developer
